column4: I still prefer debian proper for servers .. I think that's about as unbiased as you're gonna find in here   lol
I'm not sure Progeny is either  (altho I don't recall wether it gives any DE any real bias)
is progeny still putting out a distro?
There's alphas of a progeny debian 2 .. it's more a testbed for their componentised linux tho, rather than a targetted distro
